abstract_ssm: NYU Researchers United-UAW was formed to represent research assistants at the Tandon School of Engineering and research assistants in the Biology, Chemistry, Neural Science, Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, and Psychology departments. The website contains updates from the union, a history of organizing research assistants at NYU, and information on advocacy efforts for science funding and the rights of international scholars.
